name: bitrise
title: Bitrise Builds
description:
This extension shows a list of your latest Bitrise builds.

It requires a Bitrise API key which you can get on https://app.bitrise.io/me/profile#/security.

Icons courtesy of the Bitrise team.
author: ubuntudroid

commands.name: index
commands.title: List Builds
commands.subtitle: Bitrise
commands.description: Shows a list of the latest Bitrise builds, including meta data. Allows to quickly open each build and - if applicable - PR.
